definition: to read smoothly (of text)/to blurt out (without thinking)/to suit one's taste (of food)
to obey/to follow/to arrange/to make reasonable/along/favorable
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
popular piece of doggerel/common phrase repeated as a jingle
Lüshunkou district of Dalian city 大連市|大连市, Liaoning
Lüshunkou district of Dalian city 大連市|大连市, Liaoning

sentences.english: Besides, the McCain dictum is debatable.
sentences.chinese: 除此之外，麥凱恩的順口溜也值得商榷。

sentences.english: This is the jingle that people writes to me.
sentences.chinese: 這是人們給我編的順口溜。
這是一個小男孩的順口溜。

sentences.english: Smoothing as the diving into the sea, this Australian Merlot is a deeper, brilliant red.
sentences.chinese: 這款梅洛葡萄酒口感平滑順口，色澤爲明亮的深紅色。

sentences.english: " Reporting the dish names" is an excellent Guankou piece of traditional cross talk.
sentences.chinese: 《報菜名》是傳統相聲中一段很精彩的順口溜。

sentences.english: What had happened to his dainty english consonants? they would not come .
sentences.chinese: 不知爲什麼，他那很順口的英語輔音怎麼也發不出來。

sentences.english: Filter egg mixture so that it turns out to be smooth.
sentences.chinese: 把蛋液過濾，蒸出來的茶碗蒸會更平滑順口。

sentences.english: Lumica was named the top ten outstanding enterprises in Lvshunkou District.
sentences.chinese: 被評爲旅順口區十大優秀企業。

sentences.english: For the sake of easy reading, I'd like to call it as "innovation state".
sentences.chinese: 爲了方便和順口，我還是把它叫成“創新狀態”。

sentences.english: They didn’t say much along the way, but on occasion a few words slipped out.
sentences.chinese: 他們一路上沒談什麼，除了偶爾順口說上幾句。

sentences.english: Jingle Ma is still young at heart.
sentences.chinese: 順口溜馬是還年輕的心。

sentences.english: Lushun is billed as the throat of the Bohai Sea.
sentences.chinese: 旅順口是渤海的“咽喉地帶”。
這篇作文讀起來很順口。

sentences.english: Based on the algorithm, Lvshunkou District emergency analysis system is established.
sentences.chinese: 基於該算法，旅順口區緊急分析系統建立。

definition: lit. just the right flavor/just right/just the thing/excellent
rich/strong/heavy (fragrance)/dense/full-bodied/intense
leaving a rich aftertaste/(fig.) memorable/lingering in memory
fragrance/aroma/incense
flexible/not rigid/spongy/soft or runny (not set hard)/loose (soil)
al dente
to whet the appetite/appetizing/to amuse oneself at sb's expense/to tease
moderate/reasonable/conveniently situated
sauce
detailed/meticulous/fine and careful
grease/greasy food/oily/rich (of food)/fatty/greasy and dirty/a slippery character
delicious/tasty
sweet and unctuous/(fig.) overly sentimental
(of alcohol) to go to one's head/(old) (of a bride-to-be) to bind one's hair into a bun/(of a prostitute) to receive a patron for the first time
above/on top of/on the surface of
concentrated/dense/strong (smell etc)
strong (taste, flavor, smell)
